aboutMe.aboutMe:
I love Software Development
I aspire to continue learning it for the rest of my Life; Not as a job, and more than just a Career but as a
passion!
aboutMe.firstSpan: Designing to meet specific technical, aesthetic and functional pre-determined requirements.
aboutMe.secondSpan: Maintaning the simplisity, coherency, reusability of minimalistic clean code.
aboutMe.thirdSpan: Developing fully functional apps that run on any platform.
aboutMe.fourthSpan: Creating dynamic websites that adapt to the screen size and orientation of the device being used.

personalBio.bio:
being raised by immigrant parents in the Chicago area I was taught through example that you must work hard and give 110% at anything you do.

I began working when I was only 8, I would help my mom clean houses and she would pay me depending on how dificult the job was.

Iâ€™ve been working odd jobs ever since. Everything from Car washing, Construction, Land Scaping, Snow removal, Remodeling, Demolishion, cement & wood flooring, to Hospice care for the Elderly, tele marketing, tutoring and Bilingual translating.

...Until I was presented with a beautiful opportunity to study Software Development in Colombia.

The rest is History because I will apply the same work ethic and passion to grow professionally in this carrer
